title: Projects
content: Some projects, old games and tech tests I re-created/completed in JavaScript. The majority of projects are completed, feel free to browse the many un-finished projects on my [link https://github.com/WebDevStu/]GitHub[/link]

title: Who are you?
content: Hello, I'm [span itemprop=name]Stewart Anderson[/span], aged 36, I live in [span itemprop=address]North Yorkshire[/span] with my wife and two children. I'm a [span itemprop=title]Software Engineer[/span] for a Network Security Company. Born in Scotland, I've lived in England the majority of my life, pursuing a career in development for the web.

Outside of the web world, I'm a keen Amateur Photographer, you can find me at 11:30pm taking pictures of the stars in my back garden some nights. My other main interest is Cars, a through and through petrol head, I currently have a [link http://mk3capri.co.uk/]1984 Ford Capri[/link] in my garage, that I'm (very) slowly restoring to former glory. I'm never happier than when I'm photographing cars at shows throughout the country, just need to finish my car so I can show it off.
